Reviews.Title: Decent Backup Digital
Reviews.Author: Chicago Item Exchange "Chicago Item Exchange"
Reviews.Content: Use one as an emergency digital in my vehicle in case of an accident and also gave one to young niece as a starter camera. Really not that bad for the price. Nice LCD screen.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Debb
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and its so terrible. The quality is so cheesy.  I will never buy a Polaroid again!!
